snippet: Several participants were wired for sound at the Super Bowl for “Sound FX,” an NFL Network show, and some of their utterances were priceless.
abstract: Several players, coaches and officials were wired for sound at the Super Bowl, and some of their utterances were priceless; most revealing is that New England Patriots coach Bill Belichick instructed his defense to force the New York Giants to pass to receiver Mario Manningham, who burned the Patriots with a 38-yard reception on the winning drive.
lead_paragraph: Several participants were wired for sound at the Super Bowl for “Sound FX,” an NFL Network show, and some of their utterances were priceless.
